idea:
Victor Manickam Knowledge Group is founded with the purpose of creating an environment of fulfillment and responsibility for people from different walks of life. This is made available through the unique and innovative

programs that have an everlasting impact on quality of life, education, career, business and professions. We create a way of life for every person who is engaged with us and promise an extraordinary growth in the areas that they desire.


Vision - Creating a Way of Life


Creating a way of life is a responsibility of a chosen few to go forth and multiply for what humans are worth, for what love itself is worth. In that experience of the possibility of love, the human consciousness expands.


Mission - Listen and Share

The fullest possibility of listening is infinite. When listening exists as distinguished for human beings then sharing exists as authentic. In that distinction of listening and sharing, conversations exist in a distinct realm giving rise to communication. In that form of communication exists the possibility of oneness.
name: HUMANDESIGN EDUCATION PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Grok Learning identifies and partners with various government aided schools. Grok Learning promotes and practices education that is application oriented and innovative. We use technology only a means to learn fundamental concepts of science, that are applied in real life. We have integrated following initiatives in the curriculum delivery.

1. Every class is a real-life application connecting to science with defined learning outcomes

2. Special sessions of knowledge share from international university professors and industry professionals

3. Industry tours to see real life application of knowledge.

4. International studentsâ€™ collaboration.

5. Course curriculum designed by Industry professionals.
name: GROK LEARNING PRIVATE LIMITED
